name: Leaden Sky 2 (PROTOTYPE)
description:
Leaden Sky 2 FPS PROTOTYPE is a prototype of Leaden Sky sequel.

First game is still in demo phase (you can get it here https://helghast-95.itch.io/leaden-sky-official) but it's currently not far from being done, it will be released this year so I'm already considering a sequel to continue the story.

It might shock you that a 2D game is going full 3D FPS, but that's how I always wanted it to be, unfortunatelly I didn't have necessary skills back then.

This demo is just a gameplay concept with placeholders everywhere, full game will look and play significantly better.

Let me know what you think about Leaden Sky 2 going full FPS and have fun with the prototype ;)

Controls:

WASD - movement
Shift - sprint
R - reload
LMB - shoot
RMB - aim 
F - flashlight
V - melee

WARNING: This prototype is not optimized and there might be performance issues on weaker machines.
